overview:
Shahar is the founder and CEO of Stagedom, a new music an entertainment mobile platform.

Before that he was the founder and CEO of NuConomy, a leading web analytics and advertising company (Sold to Live Person. Nasdaq:LPSN).

With more than 14 years of experience, Shahar has extensive experience in delivering technological solutions. As the business development manager of Microsoft MTC in Israel, Shahar was responsible for developing company business and marketing strategy. In addition, Shahar has years of experience as a senior Microsoft Architect, helping business throughout Europe. Shahar led some of the biggest development projects in the world, assisting companies such as Cup Gemini, Accenture and Bearing Point.

Shahar is a frequent speaker in technology and advertising conferences around the world, where he talks about the value of data and the future of digital advertising.

In his free time Shahar enjoys playing competitive basketball, watching any kind of sport, dancing, watching movies and reading the wisdom successful entrepreneurs.
